Firedrill transformed as well, but he didnt have any sign of happiness
on his face. "Primus, oh PRIMUS" he shouted, his eyes wide with fear, as
he ran as fast as he could towards Cliffjumper. He left his feet, and
slid on his knees to Cliffjumpers side, and grabbed one of the screaming
minibots hands. Immidiatly he had to let go as part of the current ran
through him. He turned away from Cliffjumper, teeth gritted, his
peaceful face replaced with an angry demon. "Who did this?" he asked
furiously, and to accent his question, his rocket launching cannon
extended itself over his shoulder, as he pulled out his laser rifle.

Beachcomber transformed, and looked on with worry. Firedrill has never
had a chance to deal with terror yet, he wasnt sure how this was going
to go.
